37#include <sys/cdefs.h>
38__RCSID("$NetBSD: mech_crammd5.c,v 1.4 2011/02/12 23:21:32 christos Exp $");
39
40#include <sys/param.h>
41
42#include <saslc.h>
43#include <stdio.h>
44#include <stdlib.h>
45#include <string.h>
46
47#include "crypto.h"
48#include "mech.h"
49#include "saslc_private.h"
50
51
52/* See RFC 2195. */
53
54/* properties */
55#define SASLC_CRAMMD5_AUTHCID SASLC_PROP_AUTHCID
56#define SASLC_CRAMMD5_PASSWD SASLC_PROP_PASSWD
57
58/**
59 * @brief do one step of the sasl authentication
60 * @param sess sasl session
61 * @param in input data
62 * @param inlen input data length
63 * @param out place to store output data
64 * @param outlen output data length
65 * @return MECH_OK - success,
66 * MECH_STEP - more steps are needed,
67 * MECH_ERROR - error
68 */
69static int
70saslc__mech_crammd5_cont(saslc_sess_t *sess, const void *in, size_t inlen,
71 void **out, size_t *outlen)
72{
73 const char *authcid, *passwd;
74 char *digest, *name;
75 int len, rv;
76
77 /* in case we are called before getting challenge from server */
78 if (inlen == 0) {
79 *out = NULL;
80 *outlen = 0;
81 return MECH_STEP;
82 }
83 if ((authcid = saslc_sess_getprop(sess, SASLC_CRAMMD5_AUTHCID))
84 == NULL) {
85 saslc__error_set(ERR(sess), ERROR_MECH,
86 "authcid is required for an authentication");
87 return MECH_ERROR;
88 }
89 if ((passwd = saslc_sess_getprop(sess, SASLC_CRAMMD5_PASSWD))
90 == NULL) {
91 saslc__error_set(ERR(sess), ERROR_MECH,
92 "passwd is required for an authentication");
93 return MECH_ERROR;
94 }
95 digest = saslc__crypto_hmac_md5_hex((const unsigned char *)passwd,
96 strlen(passwd), in, inlen);
97 if (digest == NULL) {
98 saslc__error_set_errno(ERR(sess), ERROR_NOMEM);
99 return MECH_ERROR;
100 }
101 if ((len = asprintf(&name, "%s %s", authcid, digest)) == -1) {
102 saslc__error_set_errno(ERR(sess), ERROR_NOMEM);
103 rv = MECH_ERROR;
104 }
105 else {
106 *out = name;
107 *outlen = len; /* don't count the '\0' byte */
108 rv = MECH_OK;
109 }
110 memset(digest, 0, HMAC_MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
111 free(digest);
112 return rv;
113}
114
115/* mechanism definition */
116const saslc__mech_t saslc__mech_crammd5 = {
117 .name = "CRAM-MD5",
118 .flags = FLAG_DICTIONARY,
119 .create = saslc__mech_generic_create,
120 .cont = saslc__mech_crammd5_cont,
121 .encode = NULL,
122 .decode = NULL,
123 .destroy = saslc__mech_generic_destroy
124};
125
